abilities.name: Guardian and Mentor

abilities.name: For Sigmar, Charge!
abilities.description: Fines Hour +3 charge rolls for CAVALIERS wholly within 12".

abilities.name: Run Down the Foe
abilities.description: This unit and 1 CAVALIERS wholly within 12" strike first when charging.

abilities.name: Attendant Relic Envoy
abilities.description: 1CP used on this unit or 1 unit wholly within 12" free CP.

abilities.name: Rousing Speech
abilities.description: Once per battle HEROIC ACTION 3 units wholly within 18" roll 2D6 under or equal to bravery counts as 2 models for contesting.

abilities.name: Crack Shot
abilities.description: If to-hit 6+ for each roll D6 over wounds pick model to be slayed.

abilities.name: Range Finder
abilities.description: 1 CASTELITE wholly within 12" +D6" range.

abilities.name: Fortified Position
abilities.description: Start of battle and end of movement if not moving can be fortified. No rend for missile attacks.

abilities.name: Hunt with Conviction
abilities.description: After deployment choose 1 WIZARD and get +1D to that unit.

abilities.name: Flamewood Stakes
abilities.description: After combat one unit within 3" 3+ D3MW 2+ if DEATH or DAEMON.

abilities.name: Voice of the God-King
abilities.description: Dispel 1 with +1.

abilities.name: Blessed Palanquin
abilities.description: 4+ ward.

abilities.name: Vessel of Sigmar
abilities.description: Prayer 3. 1 effect in own territory 2 if not. Hallowed Ground 5+ ward wholly within 18" The great wheel turns +2M for wholle army. Cast Out Evil. 1 dice per enemy PRIEST or WIZARD 2+ D3MW.

abilities.name: Consecrate the Land
abilities.description: End of movement. If contesting and no enemy 3+ all CoS get 6+ ward while contesting. On enemy control lose consecration.

abilities.name: Hold the Line
abilities.description: On all out attack/defense one other unit with hold the line wholly within 12" get the same for free.

abilities.name: Devastating Charge
abilities.description: +1D and +1 Rend on charge.

name: Freeguild Command Corps

abilities.name: The Marshal’s Retinue

abilities.name: Sawbones
abilities.description: 3 units wholly within 12" Heal D3 W or bring back models with D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Dispatch Spies
abilities.description: Once per turn when enemy issues command. 4+ cancels command.

abilities.name: Sound the Advance
abilities.description: +1 run and charge for units wholly within 12". +D3" for retreat for units with Great Herald.

abilities.name: Tune of the Corpus Somni
abilities.description: If models flee wholly within 12" this unit on 4+ the model does not flee.

abilities.name: Fusuliers, Fire!
abilities.description: Use fortified fusil canon stats while fortified.

abilities.description: Starts fortified, end of movement if not moved can change to fortified.

abilities.name: Resupply Run
abilities.description: Round 3+ once per battle. Reroll to-hit until end of turn.

abilities.name: Lead From the Front
